certificates.title: ACPC Teens Programming Competition
certificates.description: I participated in ACPC Teens while I was in 11th grade. I solved one problem and gained a lot of experience from the competition.

certificates.title: AI Hackathon – Cairo ICT
certificates.description: I attended a hackathon at Cairo ICT where our team solved a problem using artificial intelligence.

certificates.title: Intel ISEF Finals
certificates.description: I participated in Intel ISEF and qualified for the finals. I built an integrated robot to solve car accident problems by adding side bumpers that activate when danger is detected.

certificates.title: Intel ISEF Certification
certificates.description: This certificate is for the same Intel ISEF competition, but I received it as an additional certificate for the same project.

certificates.title: Intel ISEF – 6th Place
certificates.description: I participated in Intel ISEF and achieved 6th place. I built an all-in-one robot, and my project was featured in an interview with Youm7 newspaper.

certificates.title: ITI Mobile Development Training
certificates.description: I completed a mobile development training at ITI using Flutter. I received the Best Project award and was honored by the university president.

certificates.title: ORCE Competition – Sumo Robot
certificates.description: I participated in the ORCE competition where we built a Sumo robot.

certificates.title: ORCE Competition – Line Follower Robot
certificates.description: I participated in the ORCE competition where we built a line follower robot.

certificates.title: RoboCup Simulation Competition
certificates.description: I participated in the RoboCup competition where the robot was programmed using a simulator.

certificates.title: Top 100 Influential Figures Recognition
certificates.description: I was recognized as one of the top 100 influential people in the Arab world for building a robot using artificial intelligence.

certificates.title: Best Teamwork Award
certificates.description: I received an award for the best team-based project.

certificates.title: Data Analysis Training
certificates.description: I trained at Parkville Company in data analysis using Power BI.

certificates.title: Code.org Course
certificates.description: I completed an online course from Code.org.
